channel.title: docker on My technical gists
channel.description: Recent content in docker on My technical gists

item.title: PowerDns/dnsdist: route incoming UDP/TCP DNS queries to a pool of DoH servers
item.description: This tutorial explained how to deploy the following Squid 5 docker image and how to configure-it with a custom configuration (basic auth user).

item.title: PowerDns/dnsdist: how to run dnsdist in a Docker Container with custom configuration file
item.description: The dnsdist product is available in the official dockerhub registry of PowerDNS.
